isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 2000, 4000, 8000 - FANS AND SHUTTERS - DESCRIPTION - HORTON FAN CLUTCH WITH CUMMINS M11E AND N14E, CATERPILLAR C-10, C-12

svcproc.title: HORTON FAN CLUTCH WITH CUMMINS M11E AND N14E, CATERPILLAR C-10, C-12
svcproc.para: With this feature, the engine ECM is used to control the engine cooling fan. Other fan control components include:

item.para: A normally open (N.O.) air conditioning (A/C) high pressure switch (335).
A normally closed (N.C.) air conditioning (A/C) high pressure switch (311).
A sealed normally open (N.O.) fan solenoid relay (538), (with CAT C-10 and C-12 only).

svcproc.para: The ECM monitors engine coolant and intake manifold temperature, and air conditioning head pressure. When any of these systems operate beyond their set parameters, the ECM will control turning the fan on and off.
